name: Ice Floe Ruckers
description:
Cross the dangerous ice floes and fill your rucksack - as a brave dwarves falcon-guard, a mischievous waxen automaton, or a walking narwhal here to party. Only through teamwork will you survive this fantasy, climate apocalypse. A 1-page roleplaying game. 

Requires 1d10, 1d12, and 1d20 to play. All character details and tracking can be included on this one-page.
